original_text: For it has been granted to you that for the sake of Christ you should not only believe in him but also suffer for his sake,
korean_text: 그리스도를 위하여 너희에게 은혜를 주신 것은 다만 그를 믿을 뿐 아니라 또한 그를 위하여 고난도 받게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: For it has been granted to you
that for the sake of Christ you should believe in him
but also suffer for his sake
